articles.title: Disturbing fact about double killer leaked
articles.description: A man who murdered his wife’s friend and her daughter in a violent rage had a cyst the size of a cricket ball lodged in his brain, it can be revealed.
articles.content:
A man who murdered his wife’s friend and her daughter in a violent rage had a cyst the size of a cricket ball lodged in his brain, it can be revealed.

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com

articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
